job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Our client is looking for a competent analyst who is experienced in developing and maintaining software applications to improve maintain and help achieve business demands The company provides very competitive compensation and benefits for employees Moreover the working environment is healthy and very encouraging for growth Grab this spot and secure a bright futureltbrgtltbrgtThe key function of a Senior ProgrammerAnalystltbrgtltbrgt to define develop test analyze and maintain new software applications in support of the achievement of business requirementsltbrgtltbrgtResponsibilities to expectltbrgtltbrgtCollaborate with developers programmers and designers to conceptualize and develop new and existing software programs and applicationsltbrgtltbrgtScopingestimating stories and epicsltbrgtltbrgtConduct research on emerging application development software products languages and standards in support of procurement and development effortsltbrgtltbrgtLiaise with network administrators systems analysts and software engineers to assist in resolving problems with software products or company software systems  Drive testfirst and behaviordriven development practicesltbrgtltbrgtManage andor provide guidance to junior team membersltbrgtltbrgtOther Duties as assignedltbrgtltbrgtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgt5 years of software development using OO such as Java or CltbrgtltbrgtExperience with agile methodologies Scrum specificallyltbrgtltbrgtDesired Tomcat Spring React JQuery Javascript MySQLMarialtbrgtltbrgtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtHealthy environmentltbrgtFull Healthcare Benefits  Medical ltbrgtDental Vision Disability insuranceltbrgt401K with company matchingltbrgtPTO creditsltbrgtSalary  DOEltbrgtltbrgt
